name: puppeteer_authentication_cookies
description: Handle authentication, manage cookies, and session state

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.setCookie({name: 'session_id', value: 'abc123xyz', domain: 'example.com'}); const cookies = await page.cookies(); console.log('Cookies:', cookies.length); cookies.forEach(c => console.log(`  ${c.name}: ${c.value}`)); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Cookies: 1
  session_id: abc123xyz

Cookie set and retrieved

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.authenticate({username: 'admin', password: 'secret'}); await page.goto('https://httpbin.org/basic-auth/admin/secret'); const content = await page.evaluate(() => document.body.innerText); console.log('Auth successful:', content.includes('authenticated')); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Auth successful: true

HTTP Basic Authentication handled

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); const fs = require('fs'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.setCookie({name: 'token', value: 'eyJhbGc...'}); const cookies = await page.cookies(); fs.writeFileSync('/tmp/cookies.json', JSON.stringify(cookies)); console.log('Cookies exported:', cookies.length); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Cookies exported: 1

Session cookies saved to file
